simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Housekeeping application entry point and main process loop.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Housekeeping application initialization routine. This function performs all the required startup steps to get the application registered with the cFE services so it can begin to receive command messages.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize the Copy Table and the Runtime Table.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Registers the Copy table and Runtime table with cFE Table Services. Also processes the copy table.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes a single software bus command pipe message. Checks the message and command IDs and calls the appropriate routine to handle the command.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes the command to send a combined housekeeping message

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: This command does not affect the command execution counter, but this command will increment the cmd error counter if an invalid cmd length is detected.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes an on-board housekeeping request message.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: This command does not affect the command execution counter, but this command will increment the cmd error counter if an invalid cmd length is detected.

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes a noop ground command.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes a reset counters ground command which will reset the memory manager commmand error and command execution counters to zero.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Function called in response to a Reset Counters Command. This function will reset the HK housekeeping data.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Function called when an HK command is received.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message
The expected lenght of the command

entry.para: HK_SUCCESS if actual cmd length is same as expected
HK_BAD_MSG_LENGTH_RC if actual cmd length is not as expected
